verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> when <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2428>army,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> of his <S%H4475>dominion,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire:<s%>

And you shall not <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but shall <S%H3588>surely<s%> be <S%H8610>taken,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with you <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and you shall <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H389>Yet<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> O <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of you, You shall not <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%>

But you shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in <S%H7965>peace:<s%> and with the <S%H4955>burnings<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> you, <S%H3651>so<s%> shall they <S%H8313>burn<s%> odors for you; and they will <S%H5594>lament<s%> you, saying, <S%H1945>Ah<s%> <S%H113>lord!<s%> for I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> the <S%H1697>word,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%>

When the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%> <S%H3898>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> that were <S%H3498>left,<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> and <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H5825>Azekah:<s%> for <S%H2007>these<s%> <S%H4013>defended<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were at <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> to them;

That every <S%H376>man<s%> should let his <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>maidservant,<s%> being an <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> or an <S%H5680>Hebrewess,<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free;<s%> that <S%H1115>none<s%> should <S%H5647>serve<s%> himself of them, to wit, of a <S%H3064>Jew<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

Now when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> should let his <S%H5650>manservant,<s%> and <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H8198>maidservant,<s%> <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free,<s%> that <S%H1115>none<s%> should <S%H5647>serve<s%> themselves of them any <S%H5750>more,<s%> then they <S%H8085>obeyed,<s%> and let them <S%H7971>go.<s%>

But <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H7725>turned,<s%> and caused the <S%H5650>servants<s%> and the <S%H8198>handmaids,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they had let <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free,<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H3533>brought<s%> them into <S%H3533>subjection<s%> for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids.<s%>
Therefore the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> I <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H3318>brought<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5650>slaves,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

At the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> let you <S%H7971>go<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> an <S%H5680>Hebrew,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has been <S%H4376>sold<s%> to you; and when he has <S%H5647>served<s%> you <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> you shall let him <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> from you: but your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to me, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear.<s%>

And you were <S%H3117>now<s%> <S%H7725>turned,<s%> and had <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3477>right<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight,<s%> in <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>liberty<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor;<s%> and you had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name:<s%>

But you <S%H7725>turned<s%> and <S%H2490>polluted<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> and caused every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H8198>handmaid,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H7971>set<s%> at <S%H2670>liberty<s%> at their <S%H5315>pleasure,<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> and <S%H3533>brought<s%> them into <S%H3533>subjection,<s%> to be to you for <S%H5650>servants<s%> and for <S%H8198>handmaids.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> You have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to me, in <S%H7121>proclaiming<s%> <S%H1865>liberty,<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> to his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H7453>neighbor:<s%> <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> a <S%H1865>liberty<s%> for you, <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> to the <S%H1698>pestilence,<s%> and to the <S%H7458>famine;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> into <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have not <S%H6965>performed<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, when they <S%H3772>cut<s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> in <S%H8147>two,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1335>parts<s%> thereof,

The <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> the <S%H5631>eunuchs,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> which <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H1335>parts<s%> of the <S%H5695>calf;<s%>

I will even <S%H5414>give<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life:<s%> and their <S%H5038>dead<s%> <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall be for <S%H3978>meat<s%> to the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and to the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

And <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of them that <S%H1245>seek<s%> their <S%H5315>life,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon's<s%> <S%H2428>army,<s%> which are <S%H5927>gone<s%> up from you.

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6680>command,<s%> <S%H5002>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and cause them to <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city;<s%> and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H3920>take<s%> it, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it with <S%H784>fire:<s%> and I will <S%H5414>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> an <S%H3427>inhabitant.<s%>
